title: Request a Quote
subtitle: Get a personalized estimate for your 3D printing project
fileQuoteDesc: Upload your STL file for precise analysis and automatic quote
mustLogin: You must sign in to request quotes
analyzeBeforeSending: Please analyze the file before sending
quoteSent: Quote sent successfully! We will contact you soon.
notSure: Not sure, let the team decide
notesPlaceholder: Add any special details about your project, such as finishes, tolerances, or specific requirements...
serviceQuoteDesc: Need design, repair or consultation? Describe your project and we'll help you
attachFilesDesc: You can attach reference photos or documents
serviceDescPlaceholder: Describe in detail what you need...
noColorsAvailable: No colors available for this material
autoConfigDesc: Our system automatically analyzes your 3D model to determine optimal orientation, detect areas requiring supports, and calculate the most accurate price. We use standard layer height of 0.2mm to ensure professional quality.
enterPostalForShipping: Enter postal code to calculate shipping cost
importantNoteDesc: This estimate is automatically calculated based on your model's characteristics. The final price will be reviewed by our technical team, who will evaluate the specific details of your project and send you a detailed quote by email.
basedOnWeight: Based on estimated weight of {{weight}}g to postal code {{postalCode}}
minPricePolicyDesc: To optimize costs, the minimum price is applied ONCE per order. Additional units are charged only at actual production cost.
projectDescPlaceholder: Tell us about your project: what do you need? specific requirements? delivery deadline?
fileLinkPlaceholder: https://makerworld.com/... or Google Drive, Dropbox, etc.
fileLinkHelp: If you have your 3D file on MakerWorld, Google Drive or another cloud service, paste the link here
attachFilesHelp: You can attach reference images, photos of damaged parts, sketches, or any file that helps understand your project (images, PDFs, 3D files)
shippingNotIncluded: Enter your shipping address above to see the estimated shipping cost.
